name: Main Action
description:
Story

The evil monsters are hungry again! Their goal is the village and its inhabitants. The Raven messenger is aware of this to you. After that, the explorer portal with the ordinary world opens for you. The king informs you that there are still 10 last inhabitants left, but after saving several inhabitants, you realize that everything is not so simple. By completing the game, you will save not only the human world, but also destroy the world of monsters. Save the inhabitants, the village and the world!

Features


Main Action - 3d top-dawn shooter with pixel graphics, not a long game with magic and monsters.
  • Pixel graphics
  • Top-dawn
  • Indie
  • 3d game
  • Shooter

Gameplay


A 3D shooter with a top view in which you will try to survive yourself and help those in need.
  • Arcade machines with mini games
  • Battle arenas with monsters
  • Boss Fights
  • Obstacle courses
  • Rescue of residents
